entry.title: Update: GnuTLS-for-iOS updated to GnuTLS 2.12.0
entry.content:
GnuTLS 2.12.0 is released and i updated the GnuTLS-Libraries for iPhone/iPod Touch.

You can get it at https://github.com/x2on/GnuTLS-for-iOS

entry.title: Update: OpenSSL 1.0.0d Libraries for iPhone iPod Touch iPad
entry.content: OpenSSL 1.0.0d is released and i updated the OpenSSL-Libraries for iPhone/iPod Touch. You can get it at http://github.com/x2on/OpenSSL-for-iPhone

entry.title: SuperTux 0.3.3 for Mac OS X Snow Leopard Download
entry.content:
I build the Jump’n’Run-Game SuperTux 0.3.3 for Mac OS X with new versions from needed libraries. So it should work for Snow Leopard. Have fun…!

Download (Intel – 67,4MB): SuperTux_0.3.3.dmg

entry.title: Tutorial: Script for building OpenSSL for iOS (iPhone/iPad)
entry.content:
Related to my posts http://www.x2on.de/2010/02/01/tutorial-iphone-app-with-compiled-openssl-library/ and http://www.x2on.de/2010/07/13/tutorial-iphone-app-with-compiled-openssl-1-0-0a-library/ i created a buildscript for building OpenSSL for iOS (iPhone/iPad).

You can get it here: https://github.com/x2on/OpenSSL-for-iPhone/blob/master/build-libssl.sh

Source: {% gist 2962107 %}

entry.title: Update: OpenSSL 1.0.0c Libraries for iPhone iPod Touch iPad
entry.content: OpenSSL 1.0.0c is released and i updated the OpenSSL-Libraries for iPhone/iPod Touch. I also did some GUI-Improvements for easier understanding. You can get it at http://github.com/x2on/OpenSSL-for-iPhone
